New Records: Stephen Vogt's name is added to the list of five managers who led their team to a postseason appearance within two seasons of their playing career, having never been a player/manager.
Key Match Events: Andrés Giménez hit a walk-off single in extra innings to take down the Twins, 3-2, and clinch the Guardians' spot in the postseason.
Pre-Game Insights: Stephen Vogt entered Spring Training hoping to get everyone to buy into a basic mantra of winning the day, every day.
Post-Match Reflections: The team gathered around Vogt in the home clubhouse after the win with big bins of champagne bottles in front of them. He gave a quick speech and everyone uncorked their bottles and sprayed each other in delight.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians' work isn’t done just yet. Next is clinching the division title, which can be done as early as Saturday in St. Louis.
Others: The team made some changes to its offensive approach to add more impact this year. The bullpen is elite. The rotation has found ways to grind through a challenging year.
